entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Overcast. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
